title: Rounded Crystal Blend Litter
cleaned_text: Fully empty box every two weeks or when litter becomes saturated. Do not flush or put in drains. Wash the box with warm water and a mild, unscented soap in between changes and let it dry completely before refilling. 1. Fill litter box with 3 to 4 inches of litter 2. Scoop clumps and waste daily. Stir the litter around after scooping to ensure maximum freshness and odor control. 3. Add more litter to maintain depth of 3 to 4 inches.
